properties.name: Gordon Fall
properties.description: Waterfall along Snyder Brook near trail beginning.

properties.name: Stairs Fall
properties.description: Small stepped cascade on Snyder Brook; approximate location.

properties.name: Devil's Kitchen (approx.)
properties.description: Narrow gorge along Bumpus Brook, not precisely mapped.

properties.name: Dome Rock
properties.description: Large open ledge with expansive views of King Ravine and Northern Presidentials.

properties.name: Crag Camp (RMC)
properties.description: RMC hut on King Ravine rim, near Spur Trail.

properties.name: Gray Knob (RMC)
properties.description: RMC cabin in sheltered woods near tree line.

properties.name: The Perch Shelter
properties.description: Lean-to shelter maintained by RMC, near Randolph Path.

properties.name: Valley Way Tentsite
properties.description: Popular camping area along Valley Way Trail.

properties.name: Madison Spring Hut (AMC)
properties.description: Large AMC hut between Mt Madison and Mt Adams.

properties.name: Star Lake
properties.description: Small alpine tarn between Mt Madison and Mt Adams.

properties.name: Mount Adams Summit
properties.description: 5,799 ft summit, accessible from Star Lake.
